subject: Re: [Patch]Handle git/git-svn checkouts in mkversion.sh
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Kai Blin wrote:

> The idea is more to have a unique tag for every revision. 
> You can't use the  committish for "greater than" type comparisons.
> That wasn't my intention. I don't think a timestamp is better
> in that respect.

I agree.  The version string should be associated with a
revision ID so that it can be tracked back to a point in time
in the source tree.





cheers, jerry
